snippet: Fighting continued on Wednesday in the eastern Malaysian state of Sabah, as militants sought to reclaim part of Borneo Island for a Filipino sultan.
abstract: Air and ground assault by Malaysian forces kills at least 13 of nearly 200 militants seeking to reclaim part of Borneo Island for Filipino sultan; at least 40 people have died so far in fighting related to territory dispute.
lead_paragraph: Fighting continued on Wednesday in the eastern Malaysian state of Sabah, as militants sought to reclaim part of Borneo Island for a Filipino sultan.

headline.seo: Malaysians Kill Filipino Fighters Amid Fears of Wider Conflict
headline.main: Malaysians Kill 13 Filipino Fighters Amid Fears of Wider Conflict
headline.print_headline: Malaysia: At Least 13 Filipino Militants Killed
